reviewText: It is not like any other opera. This production is the best done in recent years in any major opera house in the world. One needs to read the synopsis as well as getting familiar with Janacek life story and the effort he put in writing the scores of this opera to appreciate it. The performances, the ballet and staging is outstanding
Found the music lyrical and engaging. Cast is uniformly strong. Production hits the right notes. I could imagine more interesting choreography.
